title: but seriously...
body: why the hell do minions disable MF's passive? that just makes her so underpowered and gives her too high of a skill floor and makes her hard to play.

replies.body: If the passive was not disabled to minions she would be taken top lane against immobile melees and never get hit. 70 flat movespeed is extremely strong when you have a range advantage.
yer but if they did fix that I think a kog is still beter as he dose way more ap and ad damage then her
